forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
